languages.text: "Да будет так". {n}Кибелла смиренно ожидает, пока вы обнажаете подходящий участок тела. В умелых руках культистки заточенный клинок нежно рассекает кожу, и сакральный символ начинает мучительно жечь и кровоточить.{/n} "Береги Его дар, Домин'{name}. Обновляй своей рукой под молитвы Ему. И однажды да снизойдет благодать".
languages.translation_comment: навесить на один этот куй виньетку боли
навесить на один этот куй виньетку боли

languages.text: "Let it be so." {n}Kibellah waits patiently as you prepare yourself for the ritual. Once you are ready, she carefully presses her blade to your skin, and carves the sacred symbol into your flesh with skilful precision. The wounds sting and burn painfully as they begin to bleed.{/n} "Treasure His gift, Domin'{name}. Inscribe it anew each time you pray. May His blessing find you."
languages.original_text: "Да будет так". {n}Кибелла смиренно ожидает, пока вы обнажаете подходящий участок тела. В умелых руках культистки заточенный клинок нежно рассекает кожу, и сакральный символ начинает мучительно жечь и кровоточить.{/n} "Береги Его дар, Домин'{name}. Обновляй своей рукой под молитвы Ему. И однажды да снизойдет благодать".

traits.locale_text: "Let it be done." {n}Kibellah humbly waits for you to choose and bare a part of your body. With skilled precision, she gently slices the skin, and the sacred symbol begins to bleed and burn with pain.{/n} "Treasure His gift, Enim'{name}. Restore it anew with your hand as you pray. May His blessing find you."

With skilled precision, she gently slices the skin, and the sacred symbol begins to bleed and burn with pain.{/n} "Treasure His gift, Enim'{name}. Restore it anew with your hand as you pray. May His blessing find you."

languages.text: «Sea, pues». {n}Kibellah aguarda con paciencia mientras te preparas para el ritual, luego presiona cuidadosamente su puñal contra tu piel y te graba el sagrado símbolo con una precisión casi artística. La herida empieza a sangrar y notas un dolor ardiente.{/n} «Atesore este don, Domin'{name}. Trace el símbolo de nuevo cada vez que rece, y reciba con ello Su bendición».
languages.original_text: "Let it be so." {n}Kibellah waits patiently as you prepare yourself for the ritual. Once you are ready, she carefully presses her blade to your skin, and carves the sacred symbol into your flesh with skilful precision. The wounds sting and burn painfully as they begin to bleed.{/n} "Treasure His gift, Domin'{name}. Inscribe it anew each time you pray. May His blessing find you."

traits.locale_text: «Sea, pues». {n}Kibellah aguarda con paciencia mientras te preparas para el ritual, luego presiona cuidadosamente su puñal contra tu piel y te graba el sagrado símbolo con una precisión casi artística. La herida empieza a sangrar y notas un dolor ardiente.{/n} «Atesore este don, Domin'{name}. Trace el símbolo de nuevo cada vez que rece, y reciba con ello Su bendición».

languages.text: 「そのままでいい」{n}キベラは、あなたが儀式の準備をする間、辛抱強く待つ。準備が整うと、彼女は刃を慎重にあなたの肌に押し当て、熟練の緻密さでもって神聖な印をあなたの体に刻み込む。傷口は指すように痛み、出血は焼けるような痛みを伴った。{/n}「主の恵みを尊びなさい、ドミン・{name}。祈るたびに刻みなおす。主の祝福があなたのもとにありますように」
languages.original_text: "Let it be so." {n}Kibellah waits patiently as you prepare yourself for the ritual. Once you are ready, she carefully presses her blade to your skin, and carves the sacred symbol into your flesh with skilful precision. The wounds sting and burn painfully as they begin to bleed.{/n} "Treasure His gift, Domin'{name}. Inscribe it anew each time you pray. May His blessing find you."

traits.locale_text: 「そのままでいい」{n}キベラは、あなたが儀式の準備をする間、辛抱強く待つ。準備が整うと、彼女は刃を慎重にあなたの肌に押し当て、熟練の緻密さでもって神聖な印をあなたの体に刻み込む。傷口は指すように痛み、出血は焼けるような痛みを伴った。{/n}「主の恵みを尊びなさい、ドミン・{name}。祈るたびに刻みなおす。主の祝福があなたのもとにありますように」

languages.text: “那就如此吧。”{n}绮贝菈耐心等待着你为仪式做好准备。当你准备好之后，她小心翼翼地将刀刃压在你的皮肤上，以极其精细的熟练动作，在你的肉体上刻下了神圣的印记刻。你的伤口开始流血，传来了灼烧般的痛楚。{/n}“珍惜祂的礼物吧，秘者{name}。每次祈祷时，都要重新刻印一遍。愿祂的祝福与你同在。”
languages.original_text: "Let it be so." {n}Kibellah waits patiently as you prepare yourself for the ritual. Once you are ready, she carefully presses her blade to your skin, and carves the sacred symbol into your flesh with skilful precision. The wounds sting and burn painfully as they begin to bleed.{/n} "Treasure His gift, Domin'{name}. Inscribe it anew each time you pray. May His blessing find you."

traits.locale_text: “那就如此吧。”{n}绮贝菈耐心等待着你为仪式做好准备。当你准备好之后，她小心翼翼地将刀刃压在你的皮肤上，以极其精细的熟练动作，在你的肉体上刻下了神圣的印记刻。你的伤口开始流血，传来了灼烧般的痛楚。{/n}“珍惜祂的礼物吧，秘者{name}。每次祈祷时，都要重新刻印一遍。愿祂的祝福与你同在。”

languages.text: "So soll es sein." {n}Kibellah wartet geduldig, während du dich auf das Ritual vorbereitest. Dann drückt sie ihre Klinge vorsichtig gegen deine Haut und schneidet kompetent und präzise das heilige Symbol in dein Fleisch. Die Wunden stechen und brennen schmerzhaft, als sie zu bluten beginnen.{/n} "Würdigt Sein Geschenk, Domin'{name}. Schreibt es bei jedem Gebet neu. Möge Sein Segen Euch finden."
languages.original_text: "Let it be so." {n}Kibellah waits patiently as you prepare yourself for the ritual. Once you are ready, she carefully presses her blade to your skin, and carves the sacred symbol into your flesh with skilful precision. The wounds sting and burn painfully as they begin to bleed.{/n} "Treasure His gift, Domin'{name}. Inscribe it anew each time you pray. May His blessing find you."

traits.locale_text: "So soll es sein." {n}Kibellah wartet geduldig, während du dich auf das Ritual vorbereitest. Dann drückt sie ihre Klinge vorsichtig gegen deine Haut und schneidet kompetent und präzise das heilige Symbol in dein Fleisch. Die Wunden stechen und brennen schmerzhaft, als sie zu bluten beginnen.{/n} "Würdigt Sein Geschenk, Domin'{name}. Schreibt es bei jedem Gebet neu. Möge Sein Segen Euch finden."

languages.text: « Alors, qu'il en soit ainsi. » {n}Kibellah attend patiemment pendant que vous vous préparez pour le rituel. Dès que vous êtes {mf|prêt|prête}, elle pose délicatement sa lame sur votre peau et grave le symbole sacré dans vos chairs avec une précision remarquable. Les plaies vous piquent et vous brûlent alors que le sang se met à couler.{/n} « Chérissez Son auguste don, Domin'{name}, et réinscrivez-le dans votre chair à chacune de vos prières. Puisse Sa bénédiction vous accompagner. »
languages.original_text: "Let it be so." {n}Kibellah waits patiently as you prepare yourself for the ritual. Once you are ready, she carefully presses her blade to your skin, and carves the sacred symbol into your flesh with skilful precision. The wounds sting and burn painfully as they begin to bleed.{/n} "Treasure His gift, Domin'{name}. Inscribe it anew each time you pray. May His blessing find you."

languages.text: "Pekâlâ." {n}Sen kendini ayine hazırlarken Kibellah, sabırla bekliyor. Hazır olduğunda bıçağı dikkatle cildine bastırıyor ve ustaca bir hassasiyetle bedenine kutsal sembolü kazıyor. Kanamaya başlayan yara, yanarcasına acıyor.{/n} "O'nun armağanının değerini bil Domin'{name}. Her dua edişinde yeniden kazı. O'nun lütfu seninle olsun."
languages.original_text: "Let it be so." {n}Kibellah waits patiently as you prepare yourself for the ritual. Once you are ready, she carefully presses her blade to your skin, and carves the sacred symbol into your flesh with skilful precision. The wounds sting and burn painfully as they begin to bleed.{/n} "Treasure His gift, Domin'{name}. Inscribe it anew each time you pray. May His blessing find you."
